title: Lesson 8: Trusting and Turning
description: Our active response to the Gospel: turning and trusting.

blocks.text: True faith involves more than just agreement with facts; it requires a turning away from our old way of life (repentance) and a complete resting in Christ's finished work (faith).
The time is fulfilled, and the kingdom of God is at hand; repent and believe in the gospel.
